title: Pset_FlowMeterTypeGasMeter
description: Device that measures, indicates and sometimes records, the volume of gas that passes through it without interrupting the flow.

GasType.title: GasType
GasType.description: Defines the types of gas that may be specified.

ConnectionSize.title: ConnectionSize
ConnectionSize.description: Defines the size of inlet and outlet pipe connections to the meter.

MaximumFlowRate.title: MaximumFlowRate
MaximumFlowRate.description: Maximum rate of flow which the meter is expected to pass.

MaximumPressureLoss.title: MaximumPressureLoss
MaximumPressureLoss.description: Pressure loss expected across the meter under conditions of maximum flow.
